annotation.spannedText: you will need a few vaccines along with protection from malaria, dengue, and cholera while visiting the Dominican Republic, even in the resort areas

classMention.mentionClass: you will need a few vaccines along with protection from malaria, dengue, and cholera while visiting the Dominican Republic, even in the resort areas

annotation.spannedText: You should also get protected from chickenpox either through vaccination or a prior case of chickenpox

classMention.mentionClass: You should also get protected from chickenpox either through vaccination or a prior case of chickenpox

annotation.spannedText: All children and adults should be current on their routine vaccines, including a recent Tdap, flu vaccine, and a complete MMR series

classMention.mentionClass: All children and adults should be current on their routine vaccines, including a recent Tdap, flu vaccine, and a complete MMR series

annotation.spannedText: People who anticipate contact with body secretions such as tattooing, dental work, or new sexual partners should also get protected

classMention.mentionClass: People who anticipate contact with body secretions such as tattooing, dental work, or new sexual partners should also get protected

annotation.spannedText: A few simple protective measures can make the difference between lovely memories of a tropical vacation and vivid memories of an unpleasant infection

classMention.mentionClass: A few simple protective measures can make the difference between lovely memories of a tropical vacation and vivid memories of an unpleasant infection

annotation.spannedText: Look both ways before you cross the street and buckle up when you are in the car

classMention.mentionClass: Look both ways before you cross the street and buckle up when you are in the car

annotation.spannedText: take a break from the car with a walk on the beach or take a nap under the palm trees

classMention.mentionClass: take a break from the car with a walk on the beach or take a nap under the palm trees

annotation.spannedText: Your local travel medicine provider is happy to help you prepare for a relaxing, memorable vacation in the sun

classMention.mentionClass: Your local travel medicine provider is happy to help you prepare for a relaxing, memorable vacation in the sun

annotation.spannedText: its possible to go places and not get sick

classMention.mentionClass: its possible to go places and not get sick

annotation.spannedText: It’s just recommended that you protect yourself to minimze the chance you will become ill, especially when the illnesses are awful

classMention.mentionClass: It’s just recommended that you protect yourself to minimze the chance you will become ill, especially when the illnesses are awful

annotation.spannedText: Talk to anyone who has contracted any of the diseases which can be prevented by vaccines – they wish they hadn’t contracted the illness

classMention.mentionClass: Talk to anyone who has contracted any of the diseases which can be prevented by vaccines – they wish they hadn’t contracted the illness

annotation.spannedText: I recommend you talk to your doctor to see what is recommended for you

classMention.mentionClass: I recommend you talk to your doctor to see what is recommended for you
